description:
Performance boots for skiers who want to train and race in the same boot. The precise, enveloping fit offers good support, twist resistance, and control through each phase of your stride. The free-flex design promotes natural foot movement, so you can refine your technique and limit energy loss.

  • World-cup speed lace pull system
  • Tall cuff and lace covers protect against snow
  • WinTherm® membrane reflects body heat to keep feet warm
  • Thermoadjustable liners can be heat-moulded for the perfect fit
  • 3D plastic reinforcements in the heel for pressure control and wear-resistance
  • Sport sole (NNN compatible) is stable and provides a precise kick with good boot-to-ski contact
name: Rossignol X8 Classic Boots - Unisex
